entry.source: {F871,1}Everything in the world falls under{F801}the gaze of Death. From edge to edge,{F801}nothing escapes his view.{F801}{F802}You, too, will die... Burn in the{F801}flames and be reduced to ashes.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Everything in the world falls under{F801}the gaze of Death. From edge to edge,{F801}nothing escapes his view.{F801}{F802}You, too, will die... Burn in the{F801}flames and be reduced to ashes.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Death gathers around a Fiend...{F801}Even as he beckons his next prey{F801}towards him...{F801}{F802}Now, fight, and answer me: are you{F801}fit to live in this darkness?{F801}Or will you die...?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Death gathers around a Fiend...{F801}Even as he beckons his next prey{F801}towards him...{F801}{F802}Now, fight, and answer me: are you{F801}fit to live in this darkness?{F801}Or will you die...?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To think one would propose a truce{F801}in battle with impending death...{F801}{F802}Very well, however...{F801}my price is dear.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To think one would propose a truce{F801}in battle with impending death...{F801}{F802}Very well, however...{F801}my price is dear.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}A promise is a promise.{F801}Go, and live.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}A promise is a promise.{F801}Go, and live.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}A powerful... spell of slumber...{F801}has fallen upon me...{F801}{F802}Perhaps a truce is... for the best...{F801}For now... let me sleep...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}A powerful... spell of slumber...{F801}has fallen upon me...{F801}{F802}Perhaps a truce is... for the best...{F801}For now... let me sleep...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...Wait. Let me heal you.{F801}{F802}If you are going to go on living,{F801}let it be a better life...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...Wait. Let me heal you.{F801}{F802}If you are going to go on living,{F801}let it be a better life...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You would speak with a Fiend...{F801}Is this you you plan to face Death?{F801}{F802}Very well, however...{F801}my price is dear.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You would speak with a Fiend...{F801}Is this you you plan to face Death?{F801}{F802}Very well, however...{F801}my price is dear.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Hear the prattling of a Fiend...{F801}What lies beyond that? Life?{F801}Or death...?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Hear the prattling of a Fiend...{F801}What lies beyond that? Life?{F801}Or death...?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahh...! You wish to quench my thirst{F801}with idle chatter?{F801}{F802}Then I shall speak.{F801}Speak of death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahh...! You wish to quench my thirst{F801}with idle chatter?{F801}{F802}Then I shall speak.{F801}Speak of death...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall go on speaking... What will{F801}you do with this momentary extension{F801}of your life?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall go on speaking... What will{F801}you do with this momentary extension{F801}of your life?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You would beg mercy from a Fiend...{F801}This, too, is humanity's fate...{F801}{F802}Very well. What would you offer in{F801}exchange for the Death that stands{F801}before you?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You would beg mercy from a Fiend...{F801}This, too, is humanity's fate...{F801}{F802}Very well. What would you offer in{F801}exchange for the Death that stands{F801}before you?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your offering is most pleasing.{F801}I shall grant you mercy, just this{F801}once.{F801}{F802}Your life glows brightly, but you{F801}teeter on the very edge of the{F801}eternal night.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your offering is most pleasing.{F801}I shall grant you mercy, just this{F801}once.{F801}{F802}Your life glows brightly, but you{F801}teeter on the very edge of the{F801}eternal night.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This irresistable drowsiness...{F801}Even Death... must slumber...{F801}{F802}Mercy...? So be it.{F801}Now is not your time to die...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This irresistable drowsiness...{F801}Even Death... must slumber...{F801}{F802}Mercy...? So be it.{F801}Now is not your time to die...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall give you even more mercy.{F801}Let your conflict between life and{F801}death intensify...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall give you even more mercy.{F801}Let your conflict between life and{F801}death intensify...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do you think you can take money from{F801}a Fiend? From Death itself?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do you think you can take money from{F801}a Fiend? From Death itself?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Human, your soul has touched Death{F801}in its struggle to free itself from{F801}the chains of greed...{F801}{F802}Now your soul shall be freed through{F801}death!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Human, your soul has touched Death{F801}in its struggle to free itself from{F801}the chains of greed...{F801}{F802}Now your soul shall be freed through{F801}death!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Are you going to continue this{F801}savage balancing act over the abyss{F801}of Death...?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Are you going to continue this{F801}savage balancing act over the abyss{F801}of Death...?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}A foolish farce... I shall give you{F801}all the money you want.{F801}{F802}Indulge in your transient pleasures{F801}with your pointless money...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}A foolish farce... I shall give you{F801}all the money you want.{F801}{F802}Indulge in your transient pleasures{F801}with your pointless money...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}.........!{F801}{F802}Your fingers have touched the depths{F801}of Death, the very core of Death...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}.........!{F801}{F802}Your fingers have touched the depths{F801}of Death, the very core of Death...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do you think you can take money from{F801}a Fiend? From Death itself?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do you think you can take money from{F801}a Fiend? From Death itself?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}What lies inside the treasure?{F801}The abyss of Death? Or is your end{F801}further off...?{F801}{F802}Either way, the cost is not cheap...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}What lies inside the treasure?{F801}The abyss of Death? Or is your end{F801}further off...?{F801}{F802}Either way, the cost is not cheap...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Take this treasure, scooped from{F801}the depths of Death itself.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Take this treasure, scooped from{F801}the depths of Death itself.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Mwahahahaha...! How strange this is!{F801}{F802}To think that I, Death, would give{F801}a human charity!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Mwahahahaha...! How strange this is!{F801}{F802}To think that I, Death, would give{F801}a human charity!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}The flow of time is valuable...{F801}You should decide now on a price.{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Will you answer to that?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}The flow of time is valuable...{F801}You should decide now on a price.{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Will you answer to that?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}life...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}But only a little.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}life...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}But only a little.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}life...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}Enough to feel Death's breath on{F801}your neck.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}life...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}Enough to feel Death's breath on{F801}your neck.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}spirit...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}But only a little.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}spirit...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}But only a little.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}Spirit...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}Enough to feel Death's breath on{F801}your neck.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall take your {F804,1}Spirit...{F804,0}{F801}{F804,1}Enough to feel Death's breath on{F801}your neck.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I crave death... That of your ally!{F801}I shall take {F804,1}the life of{F801}{F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I crave death... That of your ally!{F801}I shall take {F804,1}the life of{F801}{F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall take {F804,1}that.{F804,0}{F801}Yes, {F804,1}that{F804,0} is what I desire...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall take {F804,1}that.{F804,0}{F801}Yes, {F804,1}that{F804,0} is what I desire...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This thirst that cannot be put into{F801}words... What will quench it?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This thirst that cannot be put into{F801}words... What will quench it?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}The brilliance of life...{F801}Let me touch it.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}The brilliance of life...{F801}Let me touch it.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahhh... Marvelous...{F801}This is a rare life indeed...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahhh... Marvelous...{F801}This is a rare life indeed...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahhh... Marvelous...{F801}This is a rare life indeed...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahhh... Marvelous...{F801}This is a rare life indeed...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You have done well in your offering.{F801}I am filled with satisfaction.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You have done well in your offering.{F801}I am filled with satisfaction.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To think that you hold back when{F801}faced with a Fiend...{F801}{F802}You think to lightly of your life.{F801}Death is becoming of you.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To think that you hold back when{F801}faced with a Fiend...{F801}{F802}You think to lightly of your life.{F801}Death is becoming of you.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}It is over... Your negotiation's{F801}fate ends here.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}It is over... Your negotiation's{F801}fate ends here.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Did you think you could deceive{F801}Death itself...?{F801}{F802}Your insincerity deserves only a{F801}swift Death.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Did you think you could deceive{F801}Death itself...?{F801}{F802}Your insincerity deserves only a{F801}swift Death.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You do not have it...?{F801}You own an empty life...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You do not have it...?{F801}You own an empty life...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Even in the face of Death, you{F801}should have a Life Stone...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Even in the face of Death, you{F801}should have a Life Stone...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Even if my thirst is quenched, too{F801}much will only lead to decay...{F801}{F802}Very well. Now is a good time.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Even if my thirst is quenched, too{F801}much will only lead to decay...{F801}{F802}Very well. Now is a good time.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Did you think you could leave{F801}without slaking the thirst of a{F801}Fiend...?{F801}{F802}Such disrespect deserves only death.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Did you think you could leave{F801}without slaking the thirst of a{F801}Fiend...?{F801}{F802}Such disrespect deserves only death.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To think you would refuse Death so{F801}many times...{F801}{F802}The strength of your resolve is{F801}impressive.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To think you would refuse Death so{F801}many times...{F801}{F802}The strength of your resolve is{F801}impressive.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You accept everything?{F801}Are you a slave of this Fiend?{F801}{F802}Your spirit is already dying...{F801}There is nothing more to be gained{F801}from speaking with you.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You accept everything?{F801}Are you a slave of this Fiend?{F801}{F802}Your spirit is already dying...{F801}There is nothing more to be gained{F801}from speaking with you.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You stand up to a Fiend with nothing{F801}but your own life...?{F801}{F802}This is true bravery.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You stand up to a Fiend with nothing{F801}but your own life...?{F801}{F802}This is true bravery.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You repeat yourself endlessly...{F801}An unchanging mind is full of dead{F801}thoughts.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You repeat yourself endlessly...{F801}An unchanging mind is full of dead{F801}thoughts.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I spread the gaze of Death across{F801}the entire world. Finding you is{F801}a simple thing.{F801}{F802}Now, {F843,0}...{F801}Embrace the flames of Death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I spread the gaze of Death across{F801}the entire world. Finding you is{F801}a simple thing.{F801}{F802}Now, {F843,0}...{F801}Embrace the flames of Death...{F801}{F802}
